title: #192: Stalking - Advice and Activism - With Lenora Claire at CrimeCon 2019
description:
Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti continue their discussion with Lenora Claire and discuss some practical safety advice and activism live from CrimeCon in New Orleans. Stalking is both terrifying and dangerous and stalkers need a multi-agency proactive intervention.This episode is a must listen.

#TakeStalkingSeriously

#RegisterNeeded

#KnowTheLaw

#UseTheLaw

#VictimsMatter

#HerNameISLenoraClaire


Most stalkers are serial and stalk multiple victims. Please sign the petition for serial stalkers and domestic abusers to be included on the same register as sex offenders to protect future victims

https://www.change.org/p/rt-hon-theresa-may-mp-create-a-stalker-s-register


Visit Paladin National Stalking Advocacy Service and read Advice for Stalking Victims

https://paladinservice.co.uk/advice-for-victims/
